attributes.action: Ensure the Change4life campaign specifies ONLY Type2 Diabetes CAN be brought on by lifestyle & Type1 cannot as it is an autoimmune disease
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current Change4life campaign suggests that both types of Diabetes can be caused by lifestyle. This is untrue. Type1 Diabetes is an autoimmune disease that cannot be caused by an unhealthy lifestyle. Our Type1 children are being wrongly stigmatised as unhealthy, even though they have done nothing wrong to cause the development of Type1.
As parents, we urge you to ensure the inaccuracies of this campaign are ammended immeadiatley, to state that it is Type2 Diabetes the campaign is trying to prevent, not Type1. 
Our children are distressed by the TV advert telling them their condition could've been prevented & that they will die young. As the information in this advert is misleading, it is only fuelling the ignorance of the general public who are already unaware that there are two types of Diabetes, & this issue needs to be addressed now for our children's sake.
The TV adverts should be taken off the air until they have been accurately rectified & all parties involved educated on this subject.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Ensure the
Change4life campaign specifies ONLY Type2 Diabetes CAN be brought on by
lifestyle & Type1 cannot as it is an autoimmune disease"
[http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/change4life/]

You may wish to be aware that following discussions with Diabetes UK, the Department of Health have decided to modify the Change4Life advertising materials to make clear that obesity leads to type 2 diabetes.
